title: Two Sum
description: Given an array of integers `nums` and an integer `target`, return the indices of the two numbers that add up to `target`. You may assume each input has exactly one solution. You may NOT use the same element twice. Return indices in ascending order.
functionSignature: def twoSum(nums: list[int], target: int) -> list[int]:
